content: the twisted cables provide warmth and stretchiness the stitch pattern is a traditional bavarian pattern the cables are constructed very logically and the symmetrical folded hems ensure a harmonious satisfying and joyful knitting result a few words about the yarn it s merino yarn from a local bavarian spinning mill it s not at all scratchy but robust and durable available in many colors and very affordable perfect for cables and travelling twisted stitches i highly recommend it a few words about pricing sometimes you buy a pattern download it and then you re disappointed or you realize it s not suitable for your needs sometimes you re just curious and want to see how it s structured so i offer the pattern for free but if you find it valuable after downloading it you re welcome to download another paid pattern from my ravelry store or if you d like to send me sats feel free to contact me
